title: Calories in Jerusalem Artichokes
meta_description: Discover calories in jerusalem artichokes per 100g, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and nutrition breakdowns for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Raw, unpeeled Jerusalem artichokes (sunchokes); standard variety, fresh.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, soil, freshness, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of raw Jerusalem artichokes provide ~73 kcal, mostly from carbs like inulin.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted with 1 tsp olive oil per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g Jerusalem artichokes?

faqs.a: No, they have ~17g carbs per 100g, mainly inulin fiber that acts like a prebiotic.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Jerusalem artichokes?
faqs.a: Around 2g protein per 100g, making them a modest source.
Very low, only 0.2g total fat per 100g, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in Jerusalem artichokes?
faqs.a: Boiling may slightly reduce density; roasting with oil increases calories significantly.
